item.title: Change default Keyboard Shortcut – MySQL WorkBench
item.dc:creator: Avinash Dalvi
item.description:
Changing the data/main_menu.xml file to change the execute SQL shortcut doesn’t seem to work as suggested. I changed it from Modifier+Shift+Return to F5 and nothing happens, even after restarting the application. Any thoughts? <value type=”object” struct-name=”app.MenuItem” id=”com.mysql.wb.menu.query.exec” > <link type=”object”…

The post Change default Keyboard Shortcut – MySQL WorkBench appeared first on .
item.content:encoded:
Changing the data/main_menu.xml file to change the execute SQL shortcut doesn’t seem to work as suggested.

I changed it from Modifier+Shift+Return to F5 and nothing happens, even after restarting the application.

Any thoughts?

<value type=”object” struct-name=”app.MenuItem” id=”com.mysql.wb.menu.query.exec” >
<link type=”object” key=”owner” struct-name=”app.MenuItem”>com.mysql.wb.menu.query</link>
<value type=”string” key=”caption”>Execute (All or Selection)</value>
<value type=”string” key=”name”>query.execute</value>
<value type=”string” key=”command”>builtin:query.execute</value>
<value type=”string” key=”itemType”>action</value>
<value type=”string” key=”shortcut”>F5</value>
</value>

 

Reference Source : Mysql Workbench Forum

The post Change default Keyboard Shortcut – MySQL WorkBench appeared first on .

item.title: Microsoft Launch Visual Studio Live Share
item.dc:creator: Avinash Dalvi
item.description:
Microsoft is slowly coming to open source era which was started early days back. First stroke of Microsoft was launching Visual Studio C++ with all extension which is required and love to have all developer nowadays. Next big things is…

The post Microsoft Launch Visual Studio Live Share appeared first on .
item.content:encoded:
Microsoft is slowly coming to open source era which was started early days back. First stroke of Microsoft was launching Visual Studio C++ with all extension which is required and love to have all developer nowadays. Next big things is coming as yesterday launch of live share functionality.

What is Live Share?
Live Share enables your team to quickly collaborate on the same codebase without the need to synchronize code or to configure the same development tools, settings, or environment.

Reference Source : Introducing Visual Studio Live Share

The post Microsoft Launch Visual Studio Live Share appeared first on .

item.title: Open source code tool for developer
item.dc:creator: Avinash Dalvi
item.description:
Visual Studio – https://code.visualstudio.com/ Sublime text editor – https://www.sublimetext.com/   Visual Studio Code is a lightweight but powerful source code editor which runs on your desktop and is available for Windows, macOS and Linux. It comes with built-in support for JavaScript, TypeScript…

The post Open source code tool for developer appeared first on .
item.content:encoded:
• Visual Studio – https://code.visualstudio.com/
  • Sublime text editor – https://www.sublimetext.com/

 

Visual Studio Code is a lightweight but powerful source code editor which runs on your desktop and is available for Windows, macOS and Linux. It comes with built-in support for JavaScript, TypeScript and Node.js and has a rich ecosystem of extensions for other languages (such as C++, C#, Python, PHP, Go)

The post Open source code tool for developer appeared first on .

item.title: LAN Text/File/Folder Transfer Tool – Dukto R6
item.dc:creator: Suraj Koli
item.description:
Dukto is Free and open source LAN Text/File/Folder Transfer tool. Dukto main features are: Simple user interface No server or internet connection needed Zero configuration Clients auto-discovery High speed file transfer Multi-OS native support Portable version available Multi files and folders…

The post LAN Text/File/Folder Transfer Tool – Dukto R6 appeared first on .
item.content:encoded:
Dukto is Free and open source LAN Text/File/Folder Transfer tool.

Dukto main features are:

  • Simple user interface
  • No server or internet connection needed
  • Zero configuration
  • Clients auto-discovery
  • High speed file transfer
  • Multi-OS native support
  • Portable version available
  • Multi files and folders transfer
  • Transfers log
  • Send and receive text snippets (eg. useful for sending URLs)
  • Open received files directly from the application
  • Windows 7 taskbar integration with progress and transfer indicator
  • Show your IP addresses on the IP connection page
  • Full Unicode support
  • Metro style UI
  • Free and open source

Available on

  • Windows (XP or later) – Download EXE Download ZIP
  • OS X (10.6.x or later) – Download DMG
  • Linux (packaged for Ubuntu and Fedora) – Download
  • Symbian (for Nokia touch phones) – Download
  • Android Google Play Store – Download

Source : http://www.msec.it/dukto/

The post LAN Text/File/Folder Transfer Tool – Dukto R6 appeared first on .
